name: cloudvision-connector
description: A module to communicate with the CloudVision API server
author: extensions@arista.com

scripts.build:try: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development INCLUDE_EXTERNAL=true rollup -c -o dist/cloudvision-connector-full.js
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min && yarn run build:flow && yarn run docs && yarn run docs:readme && yarn run docs:md
scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run flow && yarn run test
scripts.clean-install: yarn run clean && rimraf node_modules && yarn install --pure-lockfile
scripts.clean: rimraf dist lib coverage es docs
scripts.docs: documentation build src/** --document-exported --sort-order alpha --config documentation.yml -f html -o docs
scripts.docs:md: documentation build src/** --document-exported --sort-order alpha --config documentation-export.yml -f md -o docs/cloudvision-connector.md
scripts.prepare: yarn run lint && yarn run flow && yarn run test:cov && yarn run build
